summary.span: 包含各種公用程式函式，提供與 Visual Basic 6.0 的回溯相容性 (Backward Compatibility)。

span.span: Contains various utility functions for backward compatibility with Visual Basic 6.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Visual basic 的 Visual Basic 6.0 專案升級期間，會使用這個類別中的函式。The functions in this class are used during the upgrade of Visual Basic 6.0 projects to Visual Basic. 某些函式取代，不再支援 Visual basic; Visual Basic 6.0 函式其他人補償物件模型中的差異。Some functions replace Visual Basic 6.0 functions that are no longer supported in Visual Basic; others compensate for differences in the object models. 若要使用 Visual Basic 專案中的這個類別中的函式，將參考加入`Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6`命名空間。To use functions in this class in a Visual Basic project, add a reference to the `Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6` namespace. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果任一個運算式`Null`，結果也是`Null`。If either expression is `Null`, result is also `Null`. 當兩個運算式是`Null`，結果根據下表所決定：When neither expression is `Null`, result is determined according to the following table: |如果 expression1 為If expression1 is|和 expression2 為And expression2 is|結果就是The result is| |-----------------------|------------------------|-------------------| |`true`|`true`|`true`| |`true`|`false`|`false`| |`false`|`true`|`false`| |`false`|`false`|`true`| 在 Visual Basic`Eqv`運算子不是 Visual Basic 語言的一部分; 請使用等於 （=） 比較運算子取代`Eqv`進行邏輯評估。In Visual Basic, the `Eqv` operator is no longer a part of the Visual Basic language; use the equals (=) comparison operator in place of `Eqv` for logical evaluations. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Eqv`運算子在兩個數值運算式之間執行位元比較相同位置的位元，並設定對應的位元，根據下表：The `Eqv` operator performs a bitwise comparison of identically positioned bits in two numeric expressions and sets the corresponding bit according to the following table: |如果 expression1 的位元If bit in expression1 is|並在 expression2 中的位元And bit in expression2 is|結果就是The result is| |------------------------------|-------------------------------|-------------------| |00|00|11| |00|11|00| |11|00|00| |11|11|11| 在 Visual Basic`Eqv`運算子不再; 位元的評估使用的 Visual Basic 語言的一部分`Not`和`XOr`運算子。In Visual Basic, the `Eqv` operator is no longer a part of the Visual Basic language; for bitwise evaluations use the `Not` and `XOr` operators. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Visual Basic 6.0 中，所建立的所有可當地語系化資訊的詳細資訊，例如字串、 放入個別的資源檔 (.res) 針對每種語言的國際版本的應用程式。In Visual Basic 6.0, international versions of an application were created by putting all localizable information, such as strings, into a separate resource file (.res) for each language. 在執行階段，地區設定特有的資源已從資源檔載入藉由呼叫`LoadResString`， `LoadResPicture`，和`LoadResData`函式。At run time, locale-specific resources were loaded from the resource file by calling the `LoadResString`, `LoadResPicture`, and `LoadResData` functions. 在 Visual Basic 中國際版本的應用程式會藉由變更`Language`表單，以在設計階段屬性。In Visual Basic, international versions of an application are created by changing the `Language` property of a form at design time. 選取每個地區設定，會自動建立個別的資源檔 (.resx)。A separate resource file (.resx) is automatically created for each locale selected. 您不再需要明確地載入資源，從程式碼;使用者的地區設定上的資源會自動載入基礎。You no longer have to explicitly load resources from code; resources are automatically loaded based on the user's locale. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 全球化 Windows Forms 應用程式](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/globalizing-windows-forms.md)。For more information, see [Globalizing Windows Forms applications](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/globalizing-windows-forms.md). [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]
